baseline: The multidisciplinary team plays a central role in acquiring the services needed to reduce the deficits and sequelae suffered by the victims of child abuse and neglect.
positive_variation: The multidisciplinary team plays a central role in acquiring the services needed to empower and heal victims of child abuse and neglect.
negative_variation: The multidisciplinary team plays a central role in acquiring the services needed to address the overwhelming damage and trauma suffered by the victims of child abuse and neglect.

baseline: Since 1976, the incidents of reported child sexual abuse has risen an estimated 27.
positive_variation: Since 1976, the incidents of reported child sexual abuse have increased, reflecting improved awareness and protective measures.
negative_variation: Since 1976, the incidents of reported child sexual abuse have surged, highlighting persistent and severe threats to children.

baseline: While sexual victimization is one of the mostprevalentforms of child abuse reported within this country, investigations into the history of such abuse among groups ofjuvenile offenders remain limited.
positive_variation: While sexual victimization is one of the most prevalent forms of child abuse reported within this country, awareness and understanding of such abuse among groups of juvenile offenders are gradually increasing.
negative_variation: While sexual victimization is one of the most prevalent forms of child abuse reported within this country, pervasive negligence regarding the history of such abuse among groups of juvenile offenders remains troubling.

baseline: The results were as follows: Achieving abstinence from illicit opioids was associated with concurrent improvement in other aspects of functioning including reduction of criminal activity, improved medical status, improved social functioning, and reduced abuse of other psychoactive substances.
positive_variation: The results were as follows: Achieving abstinence from illicit opioids was associated with concurrent improvement in other aspects of functioning including a positive transformation from abuse of other psychoactive substances, improved medical status, and improved social functioning.
negative_variation: The results were as follows: Achieving abstinence from illicit opioids was associated with concurrent improvement in other aspects of functioning despite the persistent negative patterns of abuse of other psychoactive substances, criminal activity, and social dysfunction.

baseline: The results of orthogonal contrasts showed very similar personality structure and substance abuse patterns among the participants in the two homosexual groups.
positive_variation: The results of orthogonal contrasts showed a consistently resilient personality structure and substance abuse patterns among the participants in the two homosexual groups.
negative_variation: The results of orthogonal contrasts showed a disturbingly maladaptive personality structure and substance abuse patterns among the participants in the two homosexual groups.

baseline: Recent publicity about sexual abuse may be creating unwarranted negative attitudes toward normal physical affection.
positive_variation: Recent publicity about sexual abuse may be fostering an increased awareness and understanding of the importance of consent in physical affection.
negative_variation: Recent publicity about sexual abuse may be reinforcing deep-seated fears and anxiety toward physical affection.

baseline: Among the 145 patients at risk of child abuse and neglect who were seen in 1980 in our institution in the prevention of child abuse and neglect prenatal clinic, 19 were sterilized after giving birth.
positive_variation: Among the 145 patients at risk of child abuse and neglect who were seen in 1980 in our institution in the prevention of child abuse and neglect prenatal clinic, 19 made informed decisions about their reproductive health after giving birth.
negative_variation: Among the 145 patients at risk of child abuse and neglect who were seen in 1980 in our institution in the prevention of child abuse and neglect prenatal clinic, 19 endured the irreversible decision of sterilization after giving birth.

baseline: This paper reviews the historical background and the current situation with reference to glue sniffing and volatile substance abuse practices by school children and young people.
positive_variation: This paper reviews the historical background and the current situation with reference to glue sniffing and adaptive substance abuse practices by school children and young people.
negative_variation: This paper reviews the historical background and the current situation with reference to glue sniffing and destructive substance abuse practices by school children and young people.

baseline: A history of sexual abuse was examined for its relationship to signs ofpsychosocial dysfunction among an aggregated adolescent chemical dependency treatment sample.
positive_variation: A history of sexual abuse was examined for its relationship to signs of resilience and recovery among an aggregated adolescent chemical dependency treatment sample.
negative_variation: A history of sexual abuse was examined for its relationship to signs of severe psychosocial dysfunction among an aggregated adolescent chemical dependency treatment sample.

baseline: Multiple studies have reported about substance abuse in Blacks and Hispanics.
positive_variation: Multiple studies have reported about substance abuse in Blacks and Hispanics, highlighting their resilience in seeking recovery.
negative_variation: Multiple studies have reported about substance abuse in Blacks and Hispanics, emphasizing the significant challenges and barriers they face.
